attributes.action: Stop Fife council from allowing the new rules for recycling centres
attributes.background: Because they is so much fly tipping in Fife and the new bin service isn't any good and people are finding it hard to recycle there waste in a correct manner and now Fife council is wanting to ban vans and trailers and make you book a appointment which you can only do up to 12 times a year

rejection.details:
The matter that you raise concerns Fife Council:
http://www.fifedirect.org.uk/
